transArray.content:
Facilities: Overall, it's okay. The room facilities are relatively new. There aren't many things around. There is a convenience store next to it that can satisfy daily shopping.

Environment: Because it is newly opened, the internal environment of the hotel is quite clean.

Service: The hotel service seemed confusing at times. The first time I requested a ride to the subway station, I was told it would arrive at 8 o'clock. The second time I made a reservation, it was told it would take 10 o'clock and the ride would go to Universal Studios.
We only went to Universal Studios once a day, at 8:30, so early in the day Universal Studios wasnâ€™t even open yet, so we had to take a taxi.
I hope the hotel lobby can better arrange car time reasonably.

Hygiene: During one cleaning session, I specifically told the cleaning aunt not to tidy the bed. Just replace the garbage and disposable items. When I came back, the bed was tidied because there were a lot of documents and items on the bed, and they were all sorted. I hope you can pay attention to this.

Overall the hotel is very good, suitable for tourists going to Universal Studios. It is only 3-5 minutes by taxi from the subway station. You can choose this hotel when traveling to Beijing in the future.
The sunset glow in the sky is not as beautiful as your beautiful smile ~ Thank you for your affirmation and evaluation of us! Xiaohan felt very happy! !
